page.title: 07HOUSEHOLD STATUS
page.content: USING INFORMATION COLLATED FROM THE 1981 POPULATION CENSUS RE THE 5,489 PRIVATE HOUSEHOLDS IN DIDCOT AND THE SURROUNDING AREA, THE FOLLOWING FIGURES HAVE EMERGED.OVER HALF(57.3%) THE HOUSEHOLDS ARE OWNER-OCCUPIED,THE REMAINING ONES BEING RENTED FROM VARIOUS SOURCES EITHER FURNISHED OR UNFURNISHED.30% OF HOUSING IS RENTED FROM THE LOCAL AUTHORITIES,1% FROM THE HOUSING ASSOCIATION AND A TOTAL OF 4.1% FROM PRIVATE LANDLORDS.A LITTLE MORE THAN 3% IS RENTED EITHER BY VIRTUE OF EMPLOYMENT OR BUSINESS.WHEN COMPARED WITH THE FIGURES FOR THE WHOLE OF SOUTH OXON.THESE PERCENTAGES ARE SEEN TO BE A FAIRLY REPRESENTATIVE SELECTION.THE MOST NOTICEABLE DEVIATION IS THAT DIDCOT HAS AN ABOVE-AVERAGE NUMBER OF COUNCIL TENANTS (22.4%).
